text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Whoa, what's happened to Rhein Kraft? Placing 4th as the favorite!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
(I don't……know anymore…… 
I can't win……and I don't know what to do……)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Eh, this sound……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
No way…… That can't be…… 
Just now……from my dream……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Is this……a dream too……? 
Have I already been swallowed up, and now I'll never……?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I can't……anymore…… 
Running is impossible now……

text_block_list.name: Old Man Reading Newspaper
text_block_list.text:
Let's see, for the races over the past year. 
Team ＜Ascella＞. They were doing great in the spring though.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
It seems like Cesario's withdrawal had a serious impact 
after all. The team doesn't appear to be doing very well.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
That's true. There doesn't seem to be a chance 
of her returning anytime soon either. But, let's 
hope that Rhein Kraft can work twice as hard.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Ugh……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry, everyone. 
I'm sorry……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Huu, they're really writing whatever they want. 
It's just filled with mindless gossip and whining 
about how it seems like it's all over.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, now Kraft is the same as us, isn't 
she? Just like how after the 『Japan Derby』 
nothing seemed to go our way, she's just like us.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: We just kept on losing, losing, and losing, and then…… finally……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Kuu……another utter defeat……! 
So, what did you want to talk about, Trainer?
I just wanted……to ask you something.
I just wanted……to ask you something.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
What's with the somber face? 
Things can't get more depressing than this, right?

I want to help you win, at any cost. 
And I'll……do anything!

I want to help you win, at any cost. 
And I'll……do anything!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Do anything……? 
What's……that paper in your hand……?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Transfer……what do you mean?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Are you saying we're disbanding our duo? 
They told you they'd be willing to accept me?
Yeah, I thought it wasn't a bad offer. For your sake.
Yeah, I thought it wasn't a bad offer. For your sake.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Wasn't bad……huh.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
You're right. If things are going wrong, then changes 
have to be made. It might be better for me. But……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: But what about for "us"!?
Us……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Are you fine with only one of us being rewarded? 
That one of our dreams will be fulfilled, but the 
other will disappear. Are you really okay with that?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Can you really say――
――that that's what makes a first-rate duo?
But, there's nothing we can……
But, there's nothing we can……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Is there really nothing!?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Just look harder! Is there really, really not a 
single thing left!? Open your eyes and look harder!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: With those eyes of yours, just what is it――that you see?
……King.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
That's right, me. When you look at me, 
is there anything you feel? Say it.
King. Together with King……
I want to win a G1 together with King……!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
See, there is something! Even if you're thrown off, and even 
if you're beaten down, that feeling still remains, doesn't it?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: In you, and in me.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
This feeling that hasn't changed this whole time, if you think you 
can just throw it away now, why don't you just try to do it now!?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
If you're able to do that, then I will too. 
So what will you do……with that paper?
King, this paper……
I'll give it back. I'll politely decline.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
……Fufu, that's right. This feeling……if it was so 
easy to throw it away, we wouldn't be struggling here.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I'll do it. In the next race, 
this time for sure――

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I didn't throw myself away. And because I stood up again, 
as King, at that 『Takamatsunomiya Kinen』 I finally achieved it……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I just wanted to prove my own worth, so, to be 
honest, I don't really understand Kraft-san's 
feeling of wanting to "Leave something behind". But……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
If you don't throw these feelings away, then you'll 
be able to reach it. That much……is the same. But 
whether Kraft-san also believes that, I don't know.
That's right. ――I'll try to do something about that, King.
That's right. ――I'll try to do something about that, King.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, at this point, the only one 
that can convince her――is you, Trainer.

Carrying all of that, I went looking for Rhein Kraft. 
I had to somehow inspire her once again.

It couldn't end with Rhein Kraft being gripped by a 
sense of helplessness and despair. I wouldn't let it!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Ah……Trainer-san……
Kraft……

She looked completely drained……I could tell just how much she was 
struggling with one glance. I'd never seen Rhein Kraft like this.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Um……you see. Well…… 
I……had a thought. I was thinking……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Maybe……I was pushing myself too hard.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
The Triple Crown girls are really amazing…… 
They're completely different from someone……reckless like me……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
They're……all always the topic of conversation. 
Like who'll win the 『Arima Kinen』 or who's number one.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Now that I think about it, ever since I debuted…… 
people have been saying that they'll go on to do great things……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: They really are amazing……

An unreserved compliment. That was――a roundabout way of 
blaming herself for not being able to achieve something.

The more those words were repeated, 
the more Rhein Kraft was hurting herself……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Those Triple Crown girls……tens, hundreds of years 
from now, everyone will still remember them.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: They'll keep running……in everyone's memories……

Rhein Kraft wasn't going to even give me a chance to reach 
out to her. She was sinking more and more. More and more……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I……couldn't do it…… I couldn't achieve it…… 
Now, nobody is talking about me at all……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
10 years from now, I'm sure noone will remember me. 
Nobody will see it. I won't be able to reach anyone.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: But……it can't be helped.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Gradually……it'll become harder and harder to win. That I 
won't shine……that I won't leave anything behind is a given……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
That's just……me. An Uma Musume that won't be remembered 
by anyone and won't leave anything behind……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: That's why! It's obvious that I would just disappear like this――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
――!? 
Trainer……-san?
choice_data_list: You're wrong! There's no way that's true!

text_block_list.text:
I inadvertently yelled……not just out of emotion. 
It was what I believed as her trainer.

There's no way you won't leave anything behind! 
I've always thought about your running!

There's no way you won't leave anything behind! 
I've always thought about your running!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: But that's……because Trainer-san is a trainer.

That's right. But that's not just favoritism. Since I'm a 
trainer, I've seen so many Uma Musume running. And among them――

That's right. But that's not just favoritism. Since I'm a 
trainer, I've seen so many Uma Musume running. And among them――

I've always thought about your running. Every time I see it, 
I can't help but think more and more about it.

I've always thought about your running. Every time I see it, 
I can't help but think more and more about it.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Yaa……!!

――I couldn't forget. 
The shock I felt the first time I saw you run.

――I couldn't forget. 
The shock I felt the first time I saw you run.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Something like this……I'll show you I can handle it!! 
Yaaaaaaaーーーー!!

――I couldn't forget. 
At the 『Hanshin JF』, the way you shined, never giving up.

――I couldn't forget. 
At the 『Hanshin JF』, the way you shined, never giving up.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Start the spurt――Here!!!! 
Yaaaaaーーーー!!

――I couldn't forget. Your first crown at the 『Oka Sho』. Taking 
the title of Queen of the Cherry Blossoms. And then――

――I couldn't forget. Your first crown at the 『Oka Sho』. Taking 
the title of Queen of the Cherry Blossoms. And then――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Just like thiiiiiiisーーーー!!

――I couldn't forget. How you carved a new path at 
the 『NHK Mile C』 becoming the Pioneer, Rhein Kraft.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: But……but compared to the Triple Crown Uma Musume……

It's true that she is an amazing Uma Musume. She might even 
be one of the most awe-inspiring Uma Musume in history. But――
You won't lose to her!
You won't lose to her!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
But that's……something only 
Trainer-san thinks……
choice_data_list: Since I think about it, it'll remain!
Since I think about it, it'll remain!

text_block_list.text:
Right, if you don't give up, it can be fulfilled. Even if she 
herself has given up――as long as "someone" doesn't give up.

I won't ever forget. You say that 10 years from 
now nobody will remember your running but……

I won't ever forget. You say that 10 years from 
now nobody will remember your running but……

I won't ever let that happen! 
Even if you've given up, I won't!

I won't ever let that happen! 
Even if you've given up, I won't!

From now on, you'll be able to run better than before. You'll win 
more. Even in the Senior class, you can still win lots of G1s.

From now on, you'll be able to run better than before. You'll win 
more. Even in the Senior class, you can still win lots of G1s.

There will be many Uma Musume who will be inspired by you. 
If you don't give up, it'll definitely happen!

There will be many Uma Musume who will be inspired by you. 
If you don't give up, it'll definitely happen!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
But there's no definite 
proof that will happen!

There is! If you don't give up it 
will definitely happen, I know it will!

There is! If you don't give up it 
will definitely happen, I know it will!

On that day, King and I succeeded because we didn't give up. 
And because we won that 『Takamatsunomiya Kinen』――

On that day, King and I succeeded because we didn't give up. 
And because we won that 『Takamatsunomiya Kinen』――

Team ＜Ascella＞ survived, 
and was able to welcome you in.

Team ＜Ascella＞ survived, 
and was able to welcome you in.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san and King-san's 『Takamatsunomiya Kinen』 victory……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: On that day, I……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Saw it together with Cesario on the street billboards. 『It makes 
you want to join that team, doesn't it?』 is what we talked about.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: And that's because Trainer-san didn't give up……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Something nobody believed would happen…… 
But, even then……because you didn't give up……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I'm……here now. 
The reason I'm here……and can run……

Rhein Kraft let that sink in. 
The path she walked together with Team ＜Ascella＞

Because there were so many points where we "Didn't give up", 
she was able to forge ahead as a Pioneer.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san…… 
Do you think……I can do it too?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Can I leave something behind? Like Trainer-san and King-san, 
if I never give up……once more. Once……again!

You can do it for sure! 
You've already brought so many of us together.
choice_data_list: Without a doubt――You'll shine in to the future!!

text_block_list.text:
You can do it for sure! 
You've already brought so many of us together.
choice_data_list: Without a doubt――You'll shine in to the future!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Uuu……! Ugh, uuuu……! 
Trainer-san……Uuu!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Uwaaaaaaaaan!!!! 
Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

My words reached her. ――I was able to persuade her. 
Everything she had been holding back was finally released.

An overflowing of the feelings that she couldn't 
give up on. That was……the only thing that could 
open up Rhein Kraft's future once again……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Aah…… Ah……
